duties_responsibilities.duty: Verify authenticity of sneakers across major brands and assess wear and SKU details.
Keep up with footwear industry trends, sneaker releases, and collaborations with retailers.
Receive, arrange, and manage inbound inventory according to brand and model.
Research and stay informed about new sneaker models and brands.
Assist Senior Authentication Specialists in the sneaker verification process.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Fashion, Sports Marketing, or related field (preferred)
